nodes.text: The Windchapped Ridge was the name given to the ridge that lay west of Frostbite Lake in the Icefall Plains of the planet Hoth. The Frostbite Redoubt was located under the ridge, and had an entrance on the west side of the ridge, while the Ice Behemoth Cave was located further underground and could be reached through an entrance on the eastern underside of the ridge. The Frozen Footpath ran to the west and south of the ridge, linking Dorn Base to the west with the Forward Bunker to the south.
